source.sqlReaderQuery: select customerid,addressid, c.rowguid crow, a.rowguid arow from saleslt.customer c join saleslt.address a on c.rowguid!=a.rowguid

properties.description: Create a pipeline name 'Ingestion_Product_To_JSON' which will copy all the product records as JSON only if total number of records >10.

Create a pipeline name 'Ingestion_Product_Addres_To_JSON' which will copy all the product records as JSON only if total number of records >10. After that check total record count in address table if they are greater than 100 then copy the adress table data as CSV in ADLS.
highwatermark concept - incremental pipeline using sql table

activities.name: fetch hwm date from sql table dbo hwm

source.sqlReaderQuery: select lastruntime from dbo.hwm where table_name='Address'

dependsOn.activity: fetch hwm date from sql table dbo hwm

sqlReaderQuery.value:
select * from saleslt.address where modifieddate > '@{activity('fetch hwm date from sql table dbo hwm').output.firstRow.lastruntime}' 
and modifieddate <= 
'@{activity('fetch address table max date').output.firstRow.lastmodifieddate}'
select 'Address' as table_name, cast('@{activity('fetch address table max date').output.firstRow.lastmodifieddate}' as datetime) as lastruntime

items.value: @createArray('select * from saleslt.customer where customerid>10','select * from saleslt.product where productid>10 and productid<1000')

properties.description: copy cust data from db table to adls

sqlReaderQuery.value:
select * from saleslt.address where modifieddate >=
'@{activity('get highwatermark date').output.firstRow.Prop_0}'
and modifieddate< '@{activity('get last modified sql date').output.value[0].lastmodifieddate}'

activities.name: Copy last modified date into High watermark file

properties.description: Linked service to connect to azure sql db to access customer data
